short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Import Aliexpress product to Woocommerce, Shopify store directly

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sendsana Aliexpress is a great tool forecommerce store owners either using woocommerce or shopify to import products from Aliexpress right into their site with just 1 click.

They are capable of importing all product related information including title, description, attributes, product preferences, reviews and others. Before importing to their store, users can make edits to what they want to move. Then click the export button to move to the selected store.

After being moved to the woocommerce store & shopify store, the website owner can still edit the product settings as appropriate.
More features will be included later. Make sure you have a valid license from the official https://sendsana.com website
